messages.subject: RE: Nanci and Amy
messages.msgSnippet: ... Nope, all nuts are out.  I don t think that he is allergic to them all, but until we have his more comprehensive allergy testing done, his allergies are
messages.messageBody:
>Nanci ... Cashew and almond....
>Would those be ok Nanci? or is it an allergy that includes all nuts?
>
>Buzz


Nope, all nuts are out. I don't think that he is allergic to them all, but until we have his more comprehensive allergy testing done, his allergies are just much too severe to take any chances. The ER docs and his family doc all told us to avoid all nuts in all forms, whole, butters, oils, etc.

Nanci K.
